content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols direct link to pattern pdf 1 **gauge** no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials** * use japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0 mm **yardage** * color 1 approx 14 g 28 47 meters * color 2 approx 14 g 28 47 meters * color 3 approx 13 g 26 43 meters 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/585m pdf
